languages.text: {n}Медленно, словно преодолевая невидимую преграду, дуло болтера опускается.{/n} "Не вижу необходимости в дальнейшей конфронтации — будем считать, что соглашение достигнуто. Мы поднимемся на борт вашего флагмана, а вы займетесь выяснением личности преступника. Вернемся к вопросу о произошедшем уже на Даргонусе в присутствии маршала".

{n}The bolter's muzzle lowers slowly, as if overcoming an invisible obstacle.{/n} "I see no need for further confrontation. Consider the issue settled for now. We will board your flagship, and you will investigate the identity of the perpetrator. Let us return to this matter in the Marshal's presence on Dargonus."
languages.original_text: {n}Медленно, словно преодолевая невидимую преграду, дуло болтера опускается.{/n} "Не вижу необходимости в дальнейшей конфронтации — будем считать, что соглашение достигнуто. Мы поднимемся на борт вашего флагмана, а вы займетесь выяснением личности преступника. Вернемся к вопросу о произошедшем уже на Даргонусе в присутствии маршала".

We will board your flagship, and you will investigate the identity of the perpetrator. Let us return to the matter in the presence of the Marshal on Dargonus."

We will board your flagship, and you will investigate the identity of the perpetrator. Let us return to this matter in the Marshal's presence on Dargonus."

We will board your flagship, and you will investigate the identity of the perpetrator. Let us return to this matter in the Marshal's presence on Dargonus."

languages.text: {n}El cañón del bólter baja poco a poco, como si sorteara un obstáculo invisible.{/n} «No veo necesidad de continuar la confrontación. Considere este asunto resuelto por ahora. Subiremos a su nave insignia mientras usted investiga la identidad del culpable. Volveremos a discutir este asunto en Dargonus, en presencia del Mariscal».
languages.original_text: {n}The bolter's muzzle lowers slowly, as if overcoming an invisible obstacle.{/n} "I see no need for further confrontation. Consider the issue settled for now. We will board your flagship, and you will investigate the identity of the perpetrator. Let us return to this matter in the Marshal's presence on Dargonus."

traits.locale_text: {n}El cañón del bólter baja poco a poco, como si sorteara un obstáculo invisible.{/n} «No veo necesidad de continuar la confrontación. Considere este asunto resuelto por ahora. Subiremos a su nave insignia mientras usted investiga la identidad del culpable. Volveremos a discutir este asunto en Dargonus, en presencia del Mariscal».

languages.text: {n}耶格尔监察官手中的爆矢枪慢慢垂了下来，仿佛克服了某种看不见的障碍一般。{/n}“我认为，我们没必要进一步对峙了，这个问题已经暂时解决了。我们会登上你的旗舰，而你负责调查肇事者的身份。等我们返回达戈努斯，见到元帅之后，再当面讨论这个问题吧。”
languages.original_text: {n}The bolter's muzzle lowers slowly, as if overcoming an invisible obstacle.{/n} "I see no need for further confrontation. Consider the issue settled for now. We will board your flagship, and you will investigate the identity of the perpetrator. Let us return to this matter in the Marshal's presence on Dargonus."

traits.locale_text: {n}耶格尔监察官手中的爆矢枪慢慢垂了下来，仿佛克服了某种看不见的障碍一般。{/n}“我认为，我们没必要进一步对峙了，这个问题已经暂时解决了。我们会登上你的旗舰，而你负责调查肇事者的身份。等我们返回达戈努斯，见到元帅之后，再当面讨论这个问题吧。”

languages.text: {n}目に見えない障害が克服されたかのように、ボルターの銃口がゆっくり下ろされる。{/n}「これ以上の対立は必要ありません。今は問題を解決することを考えましょう。私たちはあなたの旗艦に乗り、犯人を特定します。ダルゴナスの将帥のいるところでこの問題を取り扱いましょう」
languages.original_text: {n}The bolter's muzzle lowers slowly, as if overcoming an invisible obstacle.{/n} "I see no need for further confrontation. Consider the issue settled for now. We will board your flagship, and you will investigate the identity of the perpetrator. Let us return to this matter in the Marshal's presence on Dargonus."

traits.locale_text: {n}目に見えない障害が克服されたかのように、ボルターの銃口がゆっくり下ろされる。{/n}「これ以上の対立は必要ありません。今は問題を解決することを考えましょう。私たちはあなたの旗艦に乗り、犯人を特定します。ダルゴナスの将帥のいるところでこの問題を取り扱いましょう」

languages.text: {n}Le canon du bolter s'abaisse lentement, comme s'il luttait contre un obstacle invisible.{/n} « Dans ces conditions, je ne vois pas la nécessité d'en venir aux mains. Considérons le problème comme réglé jusqu'à nouvel ordre. Nous allons embarquer à bord de votre vaisseau amiral, et vous enquêterez afin d'identifier le responsable. Nous en reparlerons une fois sur Dargonus, en présence du maréchal. »
languages.original_text: {n}The bolter's muzzle lowers slowly, as if overcoming an invisible obstacle.{/n} "I see no need for further confrontation. Consider the issue settled for now. We will board your flagship, and you will investigate the identity of the perpetrator. Let us return to this matter in the Marshal's presence on Dargonus."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le canon du bolter s'abaisse lentement, comme s'il luttait contre un obstacle invisible.{/n} « Dans ces conditions, je ne vois pas la nécessité d'en venir aux mains. Considérons le problème comme réglé jusqu'à nouvel ordre. Nous allons embarquer à bord de votre vaisseau amiral, et vous enquêterez afin d'identifier le responsable. Nous en reparlerons une fois sur Dargonus, en présence du maréchal. »

languages.text: {n}Bulonatarın namlusu, sanki görünmez bir engeli aşıyormuş gibi yavaşça alçalıyor.{/n} "Yüzleşmeyi sürdürmeyi gereksiz görüyorum. Meseleyi şimdilik hallolmuş sayalım. Sancak gemisine bineceğiz, siz de failin kimliğini soruşturacaksınız. Bu meseleye Dargonus'ta, Miralay'ın huzurunda döneceğiz."
languages.original_text: {n}The bolter's muzzle lowers slowly, as if overcoming an invisible obstacle.{/n} "I see no need for further confrontation. Consider the issue settled for now. We will board your flagship, and you will investigate the identity of the perpetrator. Let us return to this matter in the Marshal's presence on Dargonus."

traits.locale_text: {n}Bulonatarın namlusu, sanki görünmez bir engeli aşıyormuş gibi yavaşça alçalıyor.{/n} "Yüzleşmeyi sürdürmeyi gereksiz görüyorum. Meseleyi şimdilik hallolmuş sayalım. Sancak gemisine bineceğiz, siz de failin kimliğini soruşturacaksınız. Bu meseleye Dargonus'ta, Miralay'ın huzurunda döneceğiz."

languages.text: {n}Die Mündung des Bolters senkt sich, als würde sie ein unsichtbares Hindernis überwinden.{/n} "Ich sehe keine Notwendigkeit einer weiteren Konfrontation. Betrachtet die Angelegenheit fürs Erste als erledigt. Wir gehen auf Euer Flaggschiff und Ihr ermittelt die Identität des Täters. Lasst uns diese Angelegenheit in Gegenwart des Marschalls auf Dargonus besprechen."
languages.original_text: {n}The bolter's muzzle lowers slowly, as if overcoming an invisible obstacle.{/n} "I see no need for further confrontation. Consider the issue settled for now. We will board your flagship, and you will investigate the identity of the perpetrator. Let us return to this matter in the Marshal's presence on Dargonus."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Mündung des Bolters senkt sich, als würde sie ein unsichtbares Hindernis überwinden.{/n} "Ich sehe keine Notwendigkeit einer weiteren Konfrontation. Betrachtet die Angelegenheit fürs Erste als erledigt. Wir gehen auf Euer Flaggschiff und Ihr ermittelt die Identität des Täters. Lasst uns diese Angelegenheit in Gegenwart des Marschalls auf Dargonus besprechen."
